media:group.media:title: Visualization of Quantum Physics (Quantum Mechanics)
media:group.media:description:
This video visually demonstrates some basic quantum physics concepts using the simple case of a free particle. 

All the simulations here are based on real equations and laws. See more information here: https://www.udiprod.com/quantum-physics/

The mathematics involved was taken from this excellent book:
https://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0387989293/visualquantummec
